title: Bramble vest not working correctlywith tower aggro
body: I was in a game as Quinn vs Sion where the enemy Sion had brought a bramble vest and was attacking my tower, I was taking damage from his bramble vest but the tower did not aggro him and kept attacking minions.

replies.body: LOL sion must have enjoyed you killing yourself while he takes the turret
It deals like 12 damage each time you get autoed tho

I believe because it's damage is technically counted as YOUR on hit effect, that as far as the tower was concerned, you were just punching yourself.

Whether it should do that or not (Considering ranged champs dominate melees in lane generally, if a melee can put themselves in position to attack your tower they shouldn't be dissuaded by the fact that you can auto them to force them to eat tower aggro), that is the most likely logic at play.

I just tested it in training mode.  The damage dealt by the vest was counted as damage dealt by my champion (in this case Dr Mundo).  I did not attack the Cait bot once during the game, and let her auto me a bunch.  As I said, the reflected damage was considered to be dealt by me, meaning that it should logically cause tower agro (just as Sunfire Cape has been known to).
